topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53c0a715636872621b810100#post_53c0a715636872621b810100
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53c0a7306368725f538d0100#post_53c0a7306368725f538d0100
Iberian and Mediterranean cultures were heavily influenced by Islamic cultures. You could see the influence in their food, architecture, some terms in their languages, and certain lifestyle practices. The Spanish effective brought these practices to the Americas and their other overseas colonies.

Cowboy culture was adopted by Americans from Mexicans. Mexicans had it brought in by the Spaniards from Spain.
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

which is why i really dont believe hip hop is a "black thing" and rock a "white thing", it all depends in how you were raised.

i mean if a caucasian guy was raised by a completely black family, he would be talking in ebonics and acting "black"
